title: Mirc 6-7.x non-OP anti-Flood and SPAM and Hate Blocker script
description:
Mirc 6-7.x non-OP anti-Flood and SPAM and Hate Blocker script


Just Copy the files to your Profile folder


e.g. /USERS/YOURNICK/APP DATA/ROAMING/MIRC/SCRIPTS


then start Mirc 7.3 or (older 6.x should work on also)

and click Tools Pull down

then scripts editor


then CLICK REMOTE TAB

and then file pull down and LOAD and browse
to the scripts folder and load the anti-flood1.ini

close script editor and it should activate

and add commands at the bottom of COMMANDS pull down


should be obvious from there on,

note the words and nicks are stored in variables

you could try to improve on the script to not use variables I guess

I think mirc 7 has a limit on size unlike a text file.
but if igets too full of Dumb Nicks you can delete all and start again to fill it.

4KB is alot of storage when just small text names


Most bots and scripts are for OPs, Administrators of chat sites not the users.. this script is for users
to stop annoying people PM-ing you
